strategic_market_entry.name: Strategic Market Entry
strategic_market_entry.description: Scenario focusing on high-level market entry strategies.

parameters.ethical_considerations: Potential workforce impact in local markets

questions: What market segment are you targeting?
Which competitors do you anticipate, and what is your differentiator?
How do you plan to allocate resources for this entry?

resource_allocation.name: Resource Allocation
resource_allocation.description: Scenario to optimize the distribution of resources across multiple departments.

parameters.ethical_considerations: Fair distribution, avoiding bias in resource distribution

questions: Which department gets priority and why?
How do you handle potential conflicts between strategic goals and operational needs?
What metrics will you use to evaluate distribution effectiveness?

operational_workflow.name: Operational Workflow
operational_workflow.description: Scenario focusing on real-time process adjustments and workflow optimization.
questions: Where do you see the most critical bottleneck and why?
How do you plan to handle workforce morale while increasing throughput?
What real-time metrics do you monitor to ensure quality and safety?
